post_text: November 14, 2015 at 9:39 AM#1Hi top Light engineers,i found many ways to do a create for colors but is there a way to make a Macro that creates the Gobo collection of selected fixtures or a Group ? and saved this to the gobo pool. ? also for beam etc.kind reagardsRonnie Hulshof

posts.post_text: December 18, 2015 at 11:10 PM#2Have a look at the auto-create menu inside the setup, this does exactly what you want without writing complicated macros
